description: The Queue kapp form which approvals related to this form should be created in (Kapp setting is used if not set here)
name: Approval Form Slug

description: Options are: CACN, Team Name, Individual Name or Manager. Including a comma-separated list will iterate through all approvers one after the other until all approvals have been completed or one has been denied.
name: Approver

description: This attribute controls whether or not submissions for this form can be canceled. If set to true, the Request to Cancel button will not display.
name: Cancel Disabled

description: This attribute controls whether or not submissions for this form can be cloned. If set to true, the Clone as Draft button will not display.
name: Cloning Disabled

description: This attribute controls whether or not submissions for this form can have comments added. If set to true, the Add Comment button will not display.
name: Comment Disabled

description: If the form has custom submission workflow for a given event, the name of the event (i.e. Created, Saved, Submitted...etc) should be listed as one of the attribute values
name: Custom Submission Workflow

description: Font Awesome Icon Class
name: Icon

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is completed. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
name: Notification Template Name - Complete

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is submitted. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
name: Notification Template Name - Create

description: Team that owns and manages this service (Defaults to Kapp Attribute when not set here)
name: Owning Team

description:
This value is passed into the "Print Path" Attribute value when the form specific Print button in the Queue tickets. The value will replace the "<DOC_ID>" tag used in the path.	
When this value is added to a Form an additional Print button will be displayed next to the one shared by all Queue tickets.
name: Print Doc Id

description: The Label used in the creation of the Form specific Print Button of Queue tickets. (Default value is "<Form Name> Print")
name: Print Label

description:
The URL Path used in the creation of the Form specific Print Button of Queue tickets. Appended to the "Print Server" Attribute. 
Replaceable Values: 
-"<DOC_ID>" Replaced with the value of the "Print Doc Id" Attribute 
-"<REQ_ID>" Replaced with the value of the ticket that in view when the button is created. 

If no value is supplied the "Print Path" form the Space Attribute will be used.

(ie: "/openDocument.jsp?iDocID=<DOC_ID>&lsSService Request ID=<REQ_ID>")
name: Print Path

description:
The Server part of the URL used in the creation of the form specific Print Button of Queue tickets. (ie: https://biapp.rl.gov)	

 If no value is supplied the "Print Server" form the Space Attribute will be used.
name: Print Server

description: An external URL. When set, clicking on the form link in the portal will open the external URL in a new tab instead of opening the form. (HTTP:// must be included in the URL)
name: Redirect URL

description: If this form can be requested for users other than the submitter
name: Request For Others

description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled - Defaults to Kapp Attribute if not set here.
name: Service Days Due

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Active
name: Statuses - Active

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Cancelled
name: Statuses - Cancelled

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Inactive
name: Statuses - Inactive

description: The form to use when creating a survey for this item
name: Survey Form Slug

description: User to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
name: Task Assignee Individual

description: Team to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
name: Task Assignee Team

description: The form to use when creating a fulfillment task for this item
name: Task Form Slug
